answers.answer: Having diabetes and not taking any treatment- means you get all sorts of problems. sexual problems are of least importance when you are diabetic. Take treatment.otherwise you will lose your erection as well.

question: I would like to know why I do not ejaculate when I masturbate. I have tried to do this many times lately. I get a erection but it is not hard as a rock. I do have diabetes and not take any thing for it.
title: non ejaculation when masturbating why?
